snoopy.blindnote:
Three close paralogs (and a degenerated copy) reside in the RPL17 gene. Due to the lack of a consensus D'box, Yang et al. (2006) predicted that U58C (SNORD58C) guides the methylation of 28S rRNA U4197, whereas Kiss-Laszlo et al. (1996) predicted that U58A guides the methylation of 28S rRNA G4198. U58ABC might guide the methylation of both bases by a sliding mechanism.(comment from snoRNABase)sno/scaRNAs with same target 28S rRNA G4198, U4197 : SNORD58A SNORD58A SNORD58C
(20090708：吉浜)ref.setを作るために、A→B
